title: Row Row Row Your Boat
short_plot_summary: Singers cheerfully row their boats down the river, enjoying each moment with a sense of happiness and encouraging others to join in on the adventure.
explanation: A person rowing a boat, representing the main action of the song
A wave, symbolizing the river where the boat is being rowed
A musical note, illustrating the melody and rhythm of the song
A smiling face, signifying the cheerful and carefree attitude of the song's message
A sleep symbol, referencing the 'life is but a dream' lyric and the sense of lightheartedness in the song
